website_summaries.verdict: Extremely affordable toaster oven with small internal dimensions.
pros: Entry-level appliance that can accommodate small amounts of food
cons: You could cook a smaller pizza, but not a chicken
Controls can be hard to read

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when purchasing this cheap of a toaster oven. It has a really hard time not burning things very quickly, and above all, is likely to blow up while using it! The glass door actually shattered in the middle of baking food- not sure if this was a malfunctioning product or if this particular oven can’t handle it’s proper duties. I would recommend spending a little more on a toaster oven, if possible. If not, then beware of shattering glass and very burnt food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are low tech seniors on a budget. This is easy to use and easy on the wallet. If you have a $50,000 kitchen, not for you. But for people like us, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: small range on timer between burning and undercooking toast
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven may be convenient for popping in a burrito or to warm up a leftover, however it is not optimal for toast. The timing mechanism has such a small range that it either allows toast to burn, or doesn't toast at all. So if you are attracted to the cheaper price of this toaster, be forewarned and ready to stand by to prevent burning toast!!
customer_reviews.author: lynda margalit

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is super easy to use and has all the features I need. It heats up really fast and gets the job done. Love the crumb tray that can be removed for cleaning. Looks great and works great, what more can I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Labrada

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday. Box is in perfect condition. But the handle has a bad dent in it. I got this for the office so I'm not going to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gripping Issues with Knobs
customer_reviews.text: Gripping issues. This product looks nice, and from the few times I have used it, it seems to cook as intended. BUT, there are significant issues gripping the knobs, if your fingers are even slightly damp. If you already have gripping issues, this is definitely not for you! I bought this to replace a much old version of a B&D toaster, that was still working, but I wanted a new stainless look. The old one had knobs with edges/shaping you could grip, even if you had just put on hand lotion. This one has round knobs, with already slippery “stainless” look coating, and no edges/shaping to grip onto.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Paperweight
customer_reviews.text: My 25 year old B&D toaster oven died so I decided to buy this one as a replacement. First thing I noticed was how light and flimsy the new toaster felt to it's older cousin. Second, this toaster suffers from a serious over design issues. Unpacking was easy and it looks great. I used it for the first time and it began to work as expected but after about 20 seconds into the toasting cycle the heating elements turned off & have never come back on.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Toasts great and it is super nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this, it’s very sleek and shiny chrome silver. The door opens but the rack doesn’t slide out when you open the door. That’s one thing I’d change. I burnt my fingers getting my toast out. It makes killer grilled cheeses! Overall I am glad I made this purchase and I would recommend it for toasting. I haven’t used and probably won’t use the convection oven setting, toasting is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the toast it produced. The toast was extremely dried out. I'm guessing because it took longer to toast than my old B&D toaster oven did. That could be due to only having two heating elements. My old one had 4 elements and did a great job, too bad it only lasted 20+ years. I gave the new one away on Craigslist and bought a Cuisinart that works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Worst toaster oven ever.
customer_reviews.text: You've got to be kidding me. This thing only works at the highest temperature setting when the timer is set to IT'S longest setting, so it only broils, and requires direct supervision. This is our second one of these, that functions in this way. I didn't realize that it was the same one when I ordered it, and now we can't even return it, because the densely populated areas of the country are on lockdown due to China's most recent black plague. My husband is furious with me for saddling us with this junk again. ...Oops. Heh...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The bad: 1. Made in China. 2. Very small. 3. It only has 2 heating elements, top and bottom. The "bake" and "warm" functions are a fraud. This device only grills & broils, with an option to select to heat. That is it. The good: 1. Compact. 2. Heats super fast. 3. The "Natural convection" function is total fraud. 4. Feels great quality for that size & price. Bottom line: PERFECT for a single person or a couple who already own a regular oven, as a wonderful appliance to broil, grill, toast and quick & easy to clean heating. NOT RECOMMENDED for any other setting that requires the functions of a regular oven or heating larger portions.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Please read review. Get a different model.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small, none of the settings are accurate, the door has no springs so it has to be opened and closed very slowly, the door doesnt sit flush so heat escapes alot, the stainless steel is stained, the cord is only about a foot long so its very limited to where it can be placed. Overall i wish i never bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Talley

customer_reviews.title: Looks Used, not New
customer_reviews.text: The product sent was used. There were scratches on front of oven and on the sides. The cord showed wear. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: One of the best toaster ovens on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple yet fully reliable toaster. This particular model has a very even heat compared to the model I had from 8 years before. The only issues I have with this is the knobs are very round so if you have slightly greasy hands, the knob is impossible to turn on or off. Unlike other models where the knob has a holder this is hard to turn unless hands are very dry. Secondly the glass in front turns very hot and I do not see a small warning text on glass mentioning that for guests at home. Otherwise this works very well
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Black & Decker product to replace a Black & Decker toaster oven that finally died after 6 years of regular use. I live alone and find it works beautifully for baking one or two pieces of bacon; thawing out individual pieces of pizza and toasting pine nuts and walnuts for use on other dishes. The only negative is that the smooth chrome knob on the timer is very difficult to turn to the left to turn off the unit. Other than that it is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Frazier

customer_reviews.title: To be expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received this today, first impressions: strong chemical smell that i hope burns off and doesnt return, timer sound is annoying as all heck but i dont eat toast so i can use the stay on option and my usual oven timer and voila problem solved. Slightly scared to eat these virgin-voyage chik’n nugs due to chemical vapor but oh well. I’m enjoying the concept of being able to cook my toddler a handful of fries at a time without heating the entire full oven and house.
customer_reviews.author: MsBrittania

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern update to a classic toaster oven.
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacement for my prior Black & Decker that served me well for over 20 years that finally gave up the ghost. Added features is that it can evenly toast 4 slices (2 hamburger buns!) at a time, warms leftovers slowly and evenly, and is very easy to keep clean. The controls were a little odd (you need to turn both dials to 'toast' to actually toast), but a little retraining of my brain took care of most of it. Unit arrived with a couple of minor cosmetic dents, which I'm willing to live with but reduced an otherwise 5 star review to 4.
customer_reviews.author: William Howell

customer_reviews.title: This toaster oven failed to meet our expectations.
customer_reviews.text: While we have been pleased over the years with B&D products this toaster oven failed. The controls knobs are very difficult to turn. We did not return it because we thought they would move more freely over time, that was a mistake. As seniors we find our ability to grip the dials difficult, slippery plus just hard to turn and turn accurately. The ability to set the degree of toasting is really a problem because of this difficulty causing us to stand over the oven and stop it when it reaches our preferred level of toasting. If you are a senior I would definitely not recommend this toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw!
customer_reviews.text: Overall an attractive, decent toaster oven that does its intended job. HOWEVER, there is a serious design flaw. The "stay on" setting activates at the fully counter clockwise position just past the "off" point. Both my wife and I have inadvertently turned the switch a bit too far and walked away with the oven ON when intending to shut it OFF. This is a fire hazard!! The "stay on" position should be fully clockwise past the maximum time setting of 30 minutes. At the very least provide a much more positive stop for off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven works so great and fits perfectly in our counter! Heats up to the Toast setting very quickly and is very easy to clean. I recommend lining the drip tray with tin foil to make it even easier to clean! By the way, when you open the door, the handle becomes the stand for the door.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly cheap toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice, but if you're looking for something with metal dials, don't be fooled, it's just plastic. I have this in my office for making my lunches and I couldn't be happier with it. Cooks everything I can put in it wonderfully and evenly. Hot sandwiches, grilled cheese, chicken, you name it. Has pretty much changed my food possibilities at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE LITTLE TOASTER THAT COULD
customer_reviews.text: I admit I've only used this toaster once. It toasted my bread. That's all I want. It's easy to use. It's small, but that's fine. I don't need a large toaster oven. It has a crumb tray. Those always make cleaning easy. In spite of my poor eyesight and inability to bend over, I can read the dials. The instructions are clear and simple. I almost always like Black+Decker appliances. This one is great for something inexpensive. After I use it more, if I discover I don't like it, I'll let you know. I realize you hang on my every word.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: What did I need-- a toaster over. That would prepare my morning toasts and hat small items. Nothing fancy, huge, or that performed other duties. I'd had a similar, older model of a B&D that had lasted a long time but had just given out. Super glad we got this. It's built well ( the other reviewer which said it was plastic was delirious-- it's metal and glass) and a few months in is doing its job super well. If you don't need a fancy gadget that does a ton of things besides toast and heat, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Simone Delima

customer_reviews.title: Burns more toast than any other toaster I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Black and Decker toaster I’ve owned over the last 20 years. The previous two worked perfectly. This new one is awful to make toast. Once you found the setting to make perfect toast, the next time it will burn at that setting. This is happening over and over. The round slick buttons are hard to turn. I still have 10 days left to return it. Will probably do that. I do not recommend this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: ilsa mayer

customer_reviews.title: Basic toaster oven, but unable to turn it off
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty basic little toaster oven that does what it advertises. However, one major failure is the ability to turn it off, aside from unplugging it, without waiting for the timer to tick down. There is no way to turn off the timer with its annoyingly loud ticking, so if your food is done earlier than expected, you can only unplug it and move out of hearing range. Seems like B&D could have put a little more thought into that.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what happened here. I was toasting something & all of a sudden starting smelling a burning odor. May I return in exchange for a new one? Thanks in advance!
customer_reviews.author: Freda S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great little toaster for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toaster oven, because I needed a cheap replacement. Pros: Price, pleasing to look at, ease in cleaning, quick and efficient heating Cons: When opening the door, the rack does not automatically extend out. I use a fork or spatula to grab the rack. The timer function is a little annoying. Turn the knob past ten then back to your desired time. It came shipped with a small dent. It is not bad enough for me to return it, so now I must live with it. (my fault)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pimienta

customer_reviews.title: One Complaint
customer_reviews.text: If my toast is done it won't allow me to turn off the timer like my last B and D Toaster. The timer has to run it's course and shut off. I find myself just unplugging the thing and letting the time end. How do designers miss these simple things? Otherwise it does great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O. K

customer_reviews.title: great mini oven toaster. good 4 baking
customer_reviews.text: ive been using this for almost 2 years i love it. yes very hot, has different functions like stay on, bake/toast/keep warm. I've made brownies, baked veggies, cookies, works for most small/medium things. I wish that when you turned off the hea i've made brownies, baked veggies, cookies, works for most small/medium things. I wish that when you turned it off it didnt "DING" so loud lol but thats my personal preference. awesome me lil oven toaster
customer_reviews.author: LizzyKat

customer_reviews.title: Isn't a good toaster
customer_reviews.text: Things work great, but toast comes out uneven. I turned down the temperature and it is still unevenly toasted. Disappointed because my previous Black and Decker toaster oven was great for 8 years, then the elements went out. I thought the "convection" design would be better. No, it's just a marketing ploy.
customer_reviews.author: Good2FeelGood

customer_reviews.title: Nice little thing.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my mom. She wanted something small to put on her kitchen counter. She got it primarily to cook small meals for herself—that way, she does not need to use the big oven and save on electricity. She is pleased with the oven so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dror Levi

customer_reviews.title: Great oven for Extra small kitchens. Very deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I only give this product for stars because the size of it is very deceiving. I had a previous toaster oven that took up the entire counter space, and that's exactly what we needed to replace. This is so small it looks like an easy bake oven. However it does cook and toast and bake like a champ it's just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It come with a stain tray
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give this toaster 5 stars if it not come with the stain tray
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toasting
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for bagels and warming up pizza or other bread items that should be crispy. It toasts beautifully and the heat exchange is very even and consistent so there is not uneven toasting.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Better than a conventional oven!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase it is much more convenient than using a normal conventional oven because you do not have to wait for it to preheat. I have not used my normal oven since purchasing this product. I am extremely pleased with the accuracy of the heat and timing features. This product is a great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Old reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have had the old reliable Black & Decker since childhood. This one continues to be reliable. My ONLY complaint is that the bottom knob, to turn to bake/on is slippery and has a fair amount of friction so it can be hard to turn.
customer_reviews.author: HBLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. I have used it everyday. Well made and easy to use. It has several options but I use the toaster to heat my pizza and make my toast. The pan come out for easy wash.
customer_reviews.author: rhondadurham

customer_reviews.title: Black & Decker 4 slice Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I love it and the size. Have only used it for toast so far. My only complaint is the dials, especially the bottom one, is hard to read and gauge. Wish it were numbered so I had an idea of which toast level I want. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I sent a lot of time looking for a nice little oven like this and was always hesitant because of the reviews. I finally settled on this and it has been working fine since I got it. Made my life a lot easier now I don’t have wait 15 -20 mins to preheat an over for something small even more when I’m always on the run.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Well marked
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice toaster oven lots of settings that are labeled well
customer_reviews.author: Capt Rio

customer_reviews.title: KNOBS ARE VERY POORLY DESIGNED
customer_reviews.text: The knobs on this unit are probably the worst design I have ever encountered on a product. They are very hard to read, slippery and hard to grasp and the timer is so tight and the knob so hard to grasp that it is impossible for me to turn it to the proper position. The graphics on the knob are inaccurate. Where they show brown toast is actually a roaring fire in the toaster, where they show light toast is only burn't toast, etc. I rarely return items but I have rarely purchased such a badly designed item
customer_reviews.author: Donald G Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean, but a little small.
customer_reviews.text: This oven seems a little easier to use and clean than my old one. It is a little small, but for the price, that should be expected. I can still cook four pieces of toast in it at once, so this is fine for me. The only thing I don't like is the timer knob, which is smooth and a little hard to turn if your hands are wet or greasy from preparing food.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainBlackton

customer_reviews.title: NOT as Described, Did Not Match the Photo we see here....
customer_reviews.text: Basically a huge disappointment. The Black Print/Decal on the face of the oven was missing. I used a flashlight to read the faint indentations on the oven’s face. After 2 days I put it in an Elks charity sale. When I reread the original Amazon listing it said “used” yet it was new. The vendor should be ashamed of the bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: Fry danger
customer_reviews.text: It's a little low powered and always takes longer than instructions. A fry dropped off the pan one time and started a literal fire in the toaster oven and my apartments fire alarm went off. I always unplug it when I'm done because the heat element stays on a really long time otherwise when cooling down
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Becker

customer_reviews.title: Worth what you pay for it
customer_reviews.text: The product is just ok but does what we need. It takes a longer time than the previous model to toast bread. The buttons are not easy to use as noted in other reviews. If you want it to actually cook something I do not recommend it. It is a cheaply made product. Nothing like previous ones we had of this product b
customer_reviews.author: Marnell Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Handy for reheating as well as for toasting.
customer_reviews.text: I need a toaster oven primarily for toasting, but also for reheating things which shouldn't go onto the microwave. I'm not going to broil anything, and if I'm baking I'll use my full size oven. The toast color selection dial is a bit hard to turn, and the toast color is uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT A CONVECTION OVEN. It’s a regular toaster oven. There is no fan. Totally false advertising. What is “natural convection” anyway?
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: black and decker makes a great product This is not only a great value but I've used black and decker toaster ovens for about forty years
customer_reviews.author: Diskin

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great toaster oven for the price range. I ordered it as a gift for my mother but when it arrived it came in it’s manufacturer box which gave away the surprise ! Other than that the oven works great, feels sturdy, and looks absolutely incredible with a nice chrome like finish
customer_reviews.author: Jalen fetter

customer_reviews.title: Not convection, not comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: It is not a convection oven, it is just a regular oven. It’s unfriendly to use, as you have to move the button after the 10 minute point and then return it to less, which feels as if you were damaging the button. It takes longer to heat than other ovens.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the quality I expected from Black and Decker. The trays and rack that go into the over get dirty very quickly and they do not clean well. It is hard to manipulate the trays, putting them in the oven and taking them out of the oven. When the oven is in use, the outside of the oven gets dangerously hot. I am disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Green

customer_reviews.title: Never the same twice.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster does not have click stops for darkness levels. You can neve get the same level of darkness twice. You have to watch your toast and stop the toaster manually.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great looking toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this toaster oven. I would definitely recommend it, the only problem and it is small one is we do not see an off note on the machine so you have to turn the heat down real low. Other than that it's a good toaster oven
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make make easy lunches , or toast and such. It's heavy duty. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: jewels utterback

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I hit toast timer but was unaware you also need to set how dark you want it toasted. Otherwise quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie UWS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo disappointed!!! I got this on May 4 took awhile to received it. Also, I bearly started using it today and turns out it doesn’t work!!!! There’s no way I can get my money back now so disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Solnayeli

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive toaster oven with awkward controls.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, easy to clean. Hard to operate. Every operation required first setting the temperature, then specify the function, and finally turn on and then off. Three separate knobs required, each knob difficult to read. On/off manually required for all but timed functions like toast. Opening the door does not turn off the heating element. No insulation, meaning the outside of the oven became extremely hot.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine F.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product works as it should. My only complaint is that the door opens easily and shuts loudly and roughly if closed by accident. No spring in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a newer version of the B&D toaster we have had for several years. We use all of the features it has and fully expect this to last 5+ years like our last ones. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bard

customer_reviews.title: Broiler  function defect.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I’ve always purchased Black & Decker products. This one unfortunately was not a good one. The broiler function, beware, when boiling oily or greasy foods, sparks fly— Very scary and very dangerous. . Sadly, I’m beyond the window of returning this product And Amazon was not much of a help.. Will have to re-purchase another item however, not a Black & Decker.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyJen

customer_reviews.title: Very Small!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have still not used this item yet but when I received this item I realized that the oven is much smaller than what the description says. I do not recommend this item if you want to bake. This oven is only good for warming a sandwich or one small plate of food.
customer_reviews.author: Grace derboghossian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love how I can just pop any food I want to bake, broil or toast and not have to worry about a regular big oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jstou

customer_reviews.title: great value and wonderful toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: perfect toast every time. I like that I can see clearly what is going on in the oven while things are heating, cooking or toasting. It is a perfect size for any kitchen and looks clean and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: picky

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working last return date
customer_reviews.text: Great product for 2 months. It’s now broken. It doesn’t heat. The timer also stopped working. Too bad I can’t return this.
customer_reviews.author: caliwife2011

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Toaster Oven! I do not recommend .. It takes way too long to toast anything. I had to buy this one as my old one for years broke. But this one wow doesn’t function well at all. Save your money and purchase another toaster oven. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Effective and economical
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a good price and does what it is supposed to do with not a lot of bells and whistles. My elderly dad says the dials are harder to read than our previous model because the contrast is not good in lower light.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Danger!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom dial is very difficult to turn. Also the automatic shutoff when the toast is done stopped working and the only way to turn the oven off was to pull the plug. This could be very dangerous and cause a fire if you are distracted. The cutoff date for a return was March 25, 2020. And of course it broke down shortly after. Very disappointing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cozycomfort

customer_reviews.title: Black and Decker Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. However, as with most ovens, the front glass gets dirty, looks awful and is hard to clean! Does anyone know the best way to keep the front glass clean?! Maybe a tinted glass would be better?
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven that won't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Going from a traditional toaster to this has been so nice. This is much easier to clean and I love the fact that you can also use it as a low-temp oven. It toasts my morning bread very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like anything about it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like anything about it. Not the trays, not the door opening, not the knobs. I will trash it and go back to my Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.author: Pat OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Small (1 or 2 pieces of toast) and only one rack position slows grilling
customer_reviews.text: Only just got the product and it seems to work ok, but it's definitely smaller than I was expecting. Only room for one large/two medium slices of toast, definitely not 4 unless they're tiny. There is also only one, fairly low, rack position, so no way to move something closer to the top for a more efficient grill.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murray

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because of its relative low price and temperature setting feature which some other low end product may not have. I have used it for baking cake and toasting bread so far. It works all right. The only complain is that the toast time setting is a bit tricky. I don't want my bread burnt. The edge of bread slice is totally burnt even with half dark setting.
customer_reviews.author: Lu J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster oven.
customer_reviews.text: Outside get a little hotter than similar models friends have and it puts out more heat - don't put it in an enclosed space
customer_reviews.author: Donald L Dale

customer_reviews.title: Shove it in there
customer_reviews.text: It definitely makes more than just toast. Chicken, pork, beef, anything you throw at it or in it.. IT COOKS
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that timing knob can easily move up but it does not move down
customer_reviews.text: It is decorative w shining stainless steel. It is excellent in every way but one. The time knob is not easy to reduce or want to shut it down. That is the reason it is not getting all around five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh R.

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Nice Looking!!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it's designed to well. Have no complaints! ~~ However it really lacks in the area of easy use!! The bottom knob that sets the cooking time is badly designed!! It's impossible to use if your hands have anything slick on them. Anyone with 'arthritis' in their hands or older women will find the knob impossible to use! It needs to be modified with a better knob!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good toaster oven.
customer_reviews.text: It is a disappointment. It does not heat up quickly; you must unplug it to turn it off and the dials too are complicated. I like toaster ovens, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: calaveras

customer_reviews.title: Good oven with bad knobs
customer_reviews.text: Great little toaster oven for the price, but I wouldn’t buy again due to the knobs. There is no grip, so if you have anything on your hands, good luck turning the bottom timer knob to turn off the oven.
customer_reviews.author: rerelaf

customer_reviews.title: An  untrusting toaster...
customer_reviews.text: Within a month of owning the toaster we realized that the heating elements turn off during the toasting cycle. We've tried fiddling with the settings and can't figure out why it does this. So toast takes forever to toast and often comes out over dried because it's been slowly baking at a low heat instead of toasting. We've tried to just put up with it but it really stinks to not be able to toast with a toaster, that's what it's for. Planning on returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 4 slices of bread nor a 9" pizza
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it and it come in quickly. There is no way you can squeeze in 4 slices of bread unless you stack the slcies ontop of each other. For squeezing in a 9" pizza.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: I understand that when a production run of thousands happens that sometimes there is a dud. This one was. It takes over 10 minutes to make toast, and forget about trying to cook food. It never gets hot enough for food. I have owned several B&D toasters over the years, this will be the last.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful toaster oven.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient size for the small kitchen. Fast in operation and a nice thing to look at. Woks wonderfully! We are very happy with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Complex knobs and dials
customer_reviews.text: I had not idea when I purchased this that the knobs and dials would be so hard to understand. Otherwise, it is a nice and affordable small oven.
customer_reviews.author: e-shopper57

customer_reviews.title: 4 slice my a@#
customer_reviews.text: you cannot put 4 slices of bread in this. your lucky to get 2 in if you use small home made type. difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Curved glass door no good
customer_reviews.text: The curved glass door on this toaster oven is not practical. When you open the door to pull out the rack, the door is curved so its in the way. Almost impossible to get the rack out without burning your hand on the door that is in the way. Design is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great but sending back for bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give it 5 starts because it’s perfect and cute but it’s smaller than I anticipated so I’ll return for a bigger one. “Yes I didn’t pay attention to the sizing part just new it fit 4 toasts”
customer_reviews.author: lory

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel finish hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel exterior is impossible to keep clean. It produces stains all on it's own & this oven looks like its 5 years old even though I just got it! I like the removable crumb tray.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkel

customer_reviews.title: i liked my old 25 year B & d toaster bettet
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the toasting knob is hard to turn off if you have over-turned how dark you want your toast. I wish the tray would pop out when you open the door so you don’t have to fish out your bread. I wish the oven turned off when you open the door.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. N.

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! 1. It caught fire today (never had that happen in my many years!) 2. I have RA and literally cannot turn the knobs. They are super slick and hard to turn.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A good oven and toaster , very effective, definately recommend it cause you will find more expensive the same model in target or walmart , price is quite reasonable here.
customer_reviews.author: Jot

customer_reviews.title: Works great, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny. Works great. One knob is pretty tight and difficult to turn but other than that, works very well. If that one knob wasn’t so tight, I’d give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this exclusively for toasting. It does a nice job and stays clean and bright looking on my counter. Holds four slices, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: ReadProf

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good little toaster oven. It looks great on your counter too. It’s just the right size. Would fit fine in a small space too.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Toasting
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to turn the knob and get just the right heat for toast bread. I have burned several pieces of bread! I like the crumb tray on the botttom but still have to unplug toaster some times, turn it upside down and get all the loose crumbs out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P.

customer_reviews.title: functional but clumsy
customer_reviews.text: Too easy to burn toast. Although a powerful toaster, the controls are not precise enough to easily prevent burning.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Seidman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toaster oven for my sons family, they had a beat up toaster oven, and this Black and decjer causgt my eye, I like the looks of this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: mrs diggy

customer_reviews.title: Major Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: This oven functions great, it does its job. The problem is the door, it has a major upward curve and gives very little clearance when trying to pull very hot things out with oven mitts or towels. It's just awkward and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Oleson

customer_reviews.title: Toaster Oven works great
customer_reviews.text: First impressions is this is a great inexpensive toaster oven that is both functional but also aesthetically pleasing. My family and I have already had the opportunity to use the toaster oven a few times and it works great. Bread toasts evenly, when reheating food it's SOO much easier to do so in this product vs using a large oven. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Devin Colomba

customer_reviews.title: "Easy bake" oven
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep awesome oven. We haven't been baking because of heat but this convection oven makes it possible
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Its Good
customer_reviews.text: I got this toaster oven a week ago. It works great for me. Its easy to clean and is pretty accurate on cook time. I use it to reheat pizza, wings. I use it to toast my bagels. I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: keisha

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster Oven with Natural Convection, Stainless Steel, TO1760SS
product_meta.description: The exclusive combination of compact construction with convection heating technology delivers fast and tasty results. The interior of the toaster oven is designed to precisely manage airflow based on the principles of thermodynamics, naturally cooking food using the four different settings (bake, broil, toast, and keep warm). With room for four slices of bread or a 9” pizza, this toaster oven is perfect for fast cooking tasks in any size kitchen.
feature_bullets: Natural Convection Technology: The interior is designed to circulate hot air throughout the oven for fast, even results.
Four Cooking Functions: Choose from convection bake, broil, toast, and keep warm.
Compact Size: Easily fit a 9” pizza, four slices of bread, or a variety of other snacks and meals.Wattage:1150W
30-Minute Timer: The precise cooking timer features a stay-on function for longer baking tasks.
Included Rack and Pan: The included rack and bake pan fit perfectly in the toaster oven.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,972 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
